name: Sort The Sheep
description:
Save the cloned sheeps from glitching out!
Sort them into little green padlocks of reality! ^-^

Made for weekly game jam 202: Clones

@Haiyoooo - Character Art & Code
@Virimine - Environment Art & Code
@Mikey2909 - Sound

and special thanks to Culoextremo for the idea :D
